actions.committee: Senate Committee on Aeronautical and Space Science
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Aeronautical and Space Science.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to make a grant for the construction of facilities for the International Space Hall of Fame.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to make a grant for the construction of facilities for the International Space Hall of Fame in Alamogords, New Mexico. Authorizes appropriations of up to $7,040,000 to carry out the provisions of this resolution.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to make a grant for the construction of facilities for the International Space Hall of Fame.
